thread.title: Good Cityhotel
thread.title_full: Good Cityhotel - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mow2512
title: Good Cityhotel
text:
Good Location. Close to Tower, Tower Hill Tube and Trinity Square. Perfect for a city trip. Very nice and attentive staff. Spacious and well equipped room, comfortable bed, loved that bathroom had a tub and a walk-in-shower. Complimentary water, coffee, tea and cookies. In-room-breakfast was very good. Currently redecoration of ground floor, but it was no disturbance.
Would stay again.
